Anna Dolan


Summary

I am a software developer with a penchant for problem-solving and an eye for detail. My experience is primarily in Rails, and I am continually working to add languages to my repertoire and become a stronger developer. With my background as a real-estate professional, I am skilled in time management and organization, and I have a great deal of experience in a client-facing environment. My skills are suited for a broad range of industries, and I hope to work alongside, and learn from, a team of well-rounded developers.
